exceptions.exn: In environment u, v : Z H1 : Zodd u H2 : Zodd v H4 : (1 | u) H5 : (1 | v) H6 : forall x : Z, (x | u) -> (x | v) -> (x | 1) x : Z H7 : (x | match u with | 0 => match v with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x => Z.neg x | Z.neg x => Z.pos x end | Z.pos x' => match match v with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x => Z.neg x | Z.neg x => Z.pos x end with | 0 => u | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match match v with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x => Z.neg x | Z.neg x => Z.pos x end with | 0 => u | Z.pos y' => Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end) H8 : (x | match u with | 0 => v | Z.pos x' => match v with | 0 => u | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match v with | 0 => u | Z.pos y' => Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end) Unable to unify "rel_prime (2 * Z.div2 u) (Z.div2 v)" with "(x | 2)".

original: intros u v H1 H2 H3. unfold rel_prime in H3. unfold Zis_gcd in H3. inversion H3 as [H4 H5 H6]; clear H3. unfold Z.sub, Z.add, Z.opp. rewrite Z.add_comm. apply Zis_gcd_intro. - apply Zodd_sum3 in H1. apply Zodd_sum1; auto. - apply Zodd_sum3 in H2. apply Zodd_sum1; auto. - intros x H7 H8. apply gcd2_rel_prime with (s := 2 * Z.div2 u) (w := Z.div2 v). + auto. + apply Zodd_div2, Zodd_sum3; auto. + apply Zodd_quot2, Zodd_sum3; auto.
